articles.description: Shannon Bogues scored a career-best 35 points, making 6 of 8 from long range, as Stephen F. Austin thrashed Northwestern State 97-50 on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Bogues scores 35 as SF Austin romps past NW State 97-50

articles.description: Branden Johnson scored 14 points and grabbed 12 rebounds and Alabama State extended its winning streak to three games, beating Alabama A&M 69-50 on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Alabama State beats Alabama A&M 69-50

articles.description: Miye Oni's 19 points helps Yale to critical two-win Ivy League weekend
articles.headline: Yale completes Ivy League back-to-back weekend sweep  - Via Ivy League

images.caption: Miye Oni's 19 points helps Yale to critical two-win Ivy League weekend
images.name: Yale completes Ivy League back-to-back weekend sweep  - Via Ivy League

articles.description: Dante Sterling scored a career-high 29 points, A.J. Mosby scored 22 points and Alcorn State downed Mississippi Valley State 94-90 in overtime Saturday night.
articles.headline: Mississippi Valley St. outlasts Alcorn St. 94-90 in OT

articles.description: Virginia suffered a surprising home loss to Virginia Tech on Saturday -- another sign that even the best teams have issues this season.
articles.headline: Virginia's loss to Virginia Tech a reminder that every team has flaws

images.caption: Chris Clarke and Virginia Tech got a big win for their tourney chances while also bringing No. 2 Virginia back to Earth a bit.
images.name: Virginia Tech vs. Virginia (Virginia Tech Hokies forward Chris Clarke (15) shoots the ball ) [576x324]

articles.description: Justin Johnson had 25 points and a career-high seven rebounds, and Western Kentucky beat Florida International 83-76 on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Western Kentucky tops FIU 83-76
